Class LinearForm3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.external.straightskeleton.LinearForm3D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class LinearForm3D
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Part of campskeleton: http://code.google.com/p/campskeleton/ Original Copyright Notice: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 Definition of a plane in form Ax + By + Cz + D = 0
    Author:
    twak

        public Point3d collide(Tuple3d rayOrigin,
              Tuple3d rayDirection)
        Returns:
        a Point3d on success, an OOB on a on-line but out of range, a LineOnPlane for co-incident (to a tolerance) line/plane and null for "they're fuppin parallel and miles apart"

        public Vector3d collideToVector(LinearForm3D other)
        Not a complete collision, compares normals to determine direction of line-intersection
        Parameters:
        other - the plane to collide with this one
        Returns:
        null if planes are parallel, direction of collision line otherwise
